properties.description: In 04 I set colate for nyc_taxi_discovery, so I dont have to use collate. Setting the numbers allows us to specify new col names. instead of LocationID I can use location_id

content.query:
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@sasynapsejgo.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        location_id  SMALLINT 1,
        borough VARCHAR(255) 2,
        zone VARCHAR(255) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(255) 4
    )
    AS [result]
